title: Lady's Slipper
description: In rural Westmorland, artist Alice Ibbetson has become captivated by the Lady's Slipper orchid. She is determined to capture its beauty for posterity, even if it means stealing the flower from the land of converted Quaker, Richard Wheeler. When Alice is implicated in a brutal murder, she is imprisoned along with the anti-royalist Wheeler.
author: Deborah Swift
